message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $2,000,000. I'm confident this will be a worthwhile investment for you.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm not sure I can meet your initial price. I'm willing to consider a price closer to $1,400,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your offer.  While I'm eager to find a fair deal, $1,400,000 falls a bit short of what I have in mind. How about we meet in the middle at $1,750,000?  I'm confident this price reflects the true value of the product.

I understand that you're looking to make a profit, but $1,750,000 is still higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll propose $1,600,000. I believe this is a fair price that balances both our interests.
